/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -fopenmp -Wall -O3   -shared -Wl,-soname,liblinearoperationsGPU.so -o lib/liblinearoperationsGPU.so CMakeFiles/linearoperationsGPU.dir/src/linearoperations/./linearoperationsGPU_generated_linearoperations.cu.o -L/work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/samples/lib -L/work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/samples/../shared/lib -L/usr/lib/nvidia-current -L/work/sdks/opencv-2.4.2/lib /work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so -lcuda -Wl,-rpath,/work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/samples/lib:/work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/samples/../shared/lib:/usr/lib/nvidia-current:/work/sdks/opencv-2.4.2/lib:/work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/cuda/lib64
